---
title: "What can security consultants learn from how police solve problems?"
date: '2024-05-15'
---

Presentation to the International Association of Professional Security 
Consultants Annual Conference in Jacksonville, Florida, outlining what lessons 
security consultants can learn from police experience of solving crime and 
security problems.

[**Presentation slides** (Powerpoint)](/slides/iapsc_2024.pptx)

Links to resources mentioned in the presentation:

  * [College of Policing Crime Reduction Toolkit](https://www.college.police.uk/research/crime-reduction-toolkit).
  * [Arizona State University Center for Problem-Oriented Policing](https://popcenter.asu.edu/).
  * [*Practical Psychology for Policing*](https://policy.bristoluniversitypress.co.uk/practical-psychology-for-policing) by Prof Jason Roach.
